summary: Checking the state and VRDE of the "Ubuntu 16.04" virtual machine using VirtualBox commands

details.comment: Checking the state and VRDE of the "Ubuntu 16.04" virtual machine using VirtualBox commands
details.content:
vboxmanage showvminfo "Ubuntu 16.04" | grep State # get the state
# vboxmanage showvminfo "Ubuntu 16.04" | grep VRDE # get VRDE
# vboxmanage showvminfo "Ubuntu 16.04"
